      Calculate the average of a collection of numbers
      static java.util.List<java.lang.Double> createAverageValueSet(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> values)
      Get a list of average values form all previous elements for each index of the given collection Example: {1, 4, 7} returns {1, 2.5, 4} because average of 1 -> 1 average of {1, 4} returns 2.5 average of {1, 4, 7} returns 4

      • createAverageValueSet

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.Double> createAverageValueSet(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> values)
        Get a list of average values form all previous elements for each index of the given collection Example: {1, 4, 7} returns {1, 2.5, 4} because average of 1 -> 1 average of {1, 4} returns 2.5 average of {1, 4, 7} returns 4
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the list of average values
